what_you_do: Cherry Tree & Associates provides investment banking services, which has become its primary business line.
who_you_serve: Cherry Tree serves business owners, financial sponsors, and large corporations in their M&A transactions, funding efforts and other advisory roles.
business_focus: Cherry Tree, headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, was founded in 1980 as a private equity/venture capital firm and later expanded into investment banking in 1996.
service_provided: M&A transactions, funding efforts, advisory roles
